name: places/ChIJXZFppyX2wokRaKJjoLH1BPY
formattedAddress: 890 West End Ave, New York, NY 10025, USA
adrFormatAddress: 890 West End Ave, New York, NY 10025-3526, USA

originalText.text: I met Rick Wohlfarth several years ago while looking for an apartment on the Upper West Side. He knew the area, knew the apartments that were available and the co-op boards. He listened to me. And, I found I could rely on his assessments. When I decided to sell the apartment, I did not even consider using another broker. Rick will ensure that, as much as possible, the sell or purchase will be a positive experience.

text.text: I met Rick Wohlfarth several years ago while looking for an apartment on the Upper West Side. He knew the area, knew the apartments that were available and the co-op boards. Rick will ensure that, as much as possible, the sell or purchase will be a positive experience.

originalText.text: We have done a number of real estate transactions and Rick and his staff stand out among them all. Rick is an exceptional broker and representative of his clients. He has a thorough knowledge of the local market and provides excellent guidance on listing, pricing and staging. Rick listens and is responsive and always motivated by the best interests of his clients. We appreciated his thoughtful counsel throughout the selling process. Rick is a joy to be around, always cheerful and positive. We are sorry we do not have another apartment to sell!

text.text: We have done a number of real estate transactions and Rick and his staff stand out among them all. Rick is an exceptional broker and representative of his clients. originalText.text: Several years ago Rick was the broker I used to purchase my apartment. He was very knowledgeable about the area, the buildings I looked at and the various co-op boards. He listened to what I wanted. When I decided to sell the apartment some months ago, Rick was the only broker I even considered. I knew he would be straightforward about what was becoming a difficult market. Working with him was a joy.

text.text: Several years ago Rick was the broker I used to purchase my apartment. He was very knowledgeable about the area, the buildings I looked at and the various co-op boards. He listened to what I wanted. When I decided to sell the apartment some months ago, Rick was the only broker I even considered. I knew he would be straightforward about what was becoming a difficult market. Working with him was a joy.

originalText.text:
Rick is an amazing realtor! He is accurate in his assessments of the market, gives excellent advice for getting ready to show the apartment and has wonderful photographers and videographers to portray the property accurately but in its best light. He is creative in his listings and in our case he actually had access to alternate possible floor plans and kitchens with renovations on our co-op line to help buyers envision possibilities. Rick gives great support with both the selling and the getting ready to sell process including having access to contractors to help with small fixes and issues in a timely way when getting ready to list the apartment.
Rick is personable, friendly, professional and also wise to the pitfalls of real estate with his years of experience. He listens to the needs of his clients. He can handle the pricing, getting ready to show and the busy process of showing the apartment and sorting offers beautifully. He understands the issues with NYC co-ops really well.
We could not have handled the whole process of selling and moving after many decades living in the co-op apartment without him.
In short, Rick is the best! I recommend him highly!!

originalText.text: Rick Wohlfarth is a great broker. He has a warm personality and loads of experience in the business . Rick was by our side and in touch throughout the entire process; from refurbishing our apartment right through to the final sale. We were kept apprised of all potential deals and Rick offered his valuable insight on each one. Once we agreed a deal, Rick managed the entire process from deal letter to contract to closing.
